verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:9
verses.text: (Beforetime in Israel, when a man went to enquire of God, thus he spake, Come, and let us go to the seer: for he that is now called a Prophet was beforetime called a Seer.)

verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:10
verses.text: Then said Saul to his servant, Well said; come, let us go. So they went unto the city where the man of God was.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:11
verses.text: And as they went up the hill to the city, they found young maidens going out to draw water, and said unto them, Is the seer here?
